description:
Upon returning from their shopping trip, Sophie and friends find a collapsed person in front of the house.
Apparently she had collapsed from hunger, so they invited her into the house.
When asked about her identity, she proclaims that she is a vampire hunter, and explains that she`s come to vanquish the vampire that lives in this neighborhood.
Panicking, everybody does their best to conceal that Sophie is a vampire.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 吸血鬼VSヴァンパイアハンター
